description: Main entry point and core UI code for the Flutter-based furniture shopping app. Sets up app initialization, theme, navigation, and health check logic.

classes.name: FurnitureApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

classes.name: SplashGate
classes.description: Stateful widget managing initial health check and navigation based on backend health status.

classes.name: ErrorScreen
classes.description: Displays error message and retry option when backend is unreachable.

classes.name: _HelpNote
classes.description: Provides guidance about loopback URLs and environment variable overrides.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main navigation page with bottom navigation bar and different pages.

classes.name: ProductsPlaceholder
classes.description: Placeholder list of products with Welcome message and backend status info.

classes.name: HelpPage
classes.description: Page providing help and environment info, including current backend URL.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point initializing Flutter binding, loading environment variables, and launching the app.
